title: Ep. 245 - The Insanity Of Student Loan Forgiveness
description:
Today on the show, Elizabeth Warren comes in with Santa’s sack of toys and offers college loan forgiveness. We’ll talk about why her plan is not only financially unsound but morally atrocious. Also, speaking of atrocious, Bernie Sanders wants felons to vote -- in prison. Date: 04-23-2019
